about_the_game:
Paragone Bomb is a top-down shooter featuring a variety of enemies, weapons, and abilities for our main character.

A tactical game with a bird's-eye view.
Steam Workshop support for custom maps and community challenges.
Single-player mode: play with enhanced bots on all our maps.
Upgrade all weapons during gameplay.
Upgrade abilities and modules.
A store where you can purchase ammo, weapons, modules, medkits, and much more using resources collected during missions.

content_descriptors.notes: The game includes scenes where players shoot and eliminate bots
